SELECT device.id AS id, device.number AS number, device.ip AS ip, device.apk_version AS apkVersion, device.mac_id AS macId, device.cup_id AS cupId, device.online_time AS onlineTime, shop.name AS shopName, device.create_time AS createTime FROM zmsk_device device INNER JOIN zmsk_shop_order shopOrder ON shopOrder.id = device.order_id LEFT JOIN zmsk_shop shop ON shop.id = shopOrder.shop_id WHERE 1=1
AND shop.name LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
AND device.number LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
AND device.apk_version LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY device.create_time DESC
